text: Filip Pankarićan (; born 28 March 1993) is a Serbian football midfielder who currently plays for Fortuna Liga club iClinic Sereď. ==Club career== Born in Zrenjanin, Filip started his career playing for local club Banat Zrenjanin. Later he played for Senta, Cement Beočin and ČSK Čelarevo. ===ŠKF Sereď=== Pankarićan made his professional Fortuna Liga debut for iClinic Sereď against Železiarne Podbrezová on 25 August 2018. He started the match in the starting- XI and was replaced by Rudolf Bilas after about 80 minutes.ŠKF iClinic Sereď - FK Železiarne Podbrezová 1:2 25.08.2018, futbalnet.sk ==References== ==External links== * * Fortuna Liga profile * Futbalnet profile Category:1993 births Category:Living people Category:Serbian footballers Category:Serbian expatriate footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:FK Senta players Category:FK Cement Beočin players Category:FK ČSK Čelarevo players Category:FK Slovan Duslo Šaľa players Category:MFK Skalica players Category:ŠKF iClinic Sereď players Category:Slovak Super Liga players Category:2. title: Filip Pankarićan
